successes.title: Maintenance-Free Bicycles that Make Cycling Easy
successes.description: A new concept in cycling, a beautifully designed bike with smart engineering & low cost. Quality with no compromise, Priority Bicycles

Pledges.description: Thank you so much for believing in Priority Bicycles. We are forever grateful, will include you in all of our backer updates, and will send a behind-the-scenes look at our process.

A beautiful BPA-free Priority Bicycles water bottle. It’s a great way to show your support for Priority and our mission to make cycling easier. We will contact you to obtain your shipping address. Shipping is included in the US.

A limited edition Priority Bicycles t-shirt. Show off your support of Priority to your friends and the world in this incredibly comfortable shirt that’s screen printed in the US. We will contact you to obtain your shipping address. Shipping is included in the US.
KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE LIMITED EDITION FIRST RUN PRIORITY BICYCLE!
